Name: Ahmad
description:
Ahmad is a 32-year-old Syrian refugee. He is a married father of four children. Ahmad works as a cement finisher however, he has been working in greenhouses with his wife for 7 years.

Today, Ahmad is acquiring a special refugee loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to buy seeds, fertilizers, and pesticides for greenhouses.

Ahmad hopes to have his own greenhouses and to expand his business.
